rules.name: Blocked Issues
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND status = Blocked AND assignee IS NOT EMPTY
rules.description: Escalate issues that have been blocked for more than 2 hours

rules.name: P1 Issues
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND priority = P1 AND status != Done
rules.description: Escalate P1 issues that haven't moved status in 30 minutes

escalation_paths.message_template: URGENT: P1 issue {issue_key} ({issue_summary}) has been in {status} for {time_in_status_minutes} minutes!

rules.name: Unassigned Issues
rules.jql: project = MYPROJECT AND assignee IS EMPTY AND status = 'To Do'
rules.description: Escalate unassigned issues that have been in To Do for more than 4 hours

escalation_paths.message_template: Issue {issue_key} has been unassigned in To Do status for {time_in_status_minutes} minutes. Please assign this issue to someone.
